text:
@TeamPelosi Nancy Pelosi is lying and she knows it. She needs to do research.

During the week of May 5, the US averaged nearly 300,000 new coronavirus tests a day, according to the Covid Tracking Project. Since the, # of tests has increased daily approaching the  500,000 per day goal.
